definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display

sentences.english: There is some artware set out in the room.
sentences.chinese: 房子里陈设着几件工艺品。
这是一间陈设简单的房间。

sentences.english: These candlesticks held two wax candles, and usually figured on the Bishop's chimney-piece.
sentences.chinese: 那对烛台上插着两支烛，经常陈设在主教的壁炉上。

sentences.english: Breakout rooms and mother-and-baby rooms are furnished like airport executive lounges.
sentences.chinese: 休息室和母婴室的陈设好像机场的行政贵宾室。

sentences.english: And thou shalt set upon the table shewbread before me alway.
sentences.chinese: 又要在桌子上，在我面前，常摆陈设饼。

sentences.english: Some of the dog's decorative furnishings are carvings by Dennis & Frances.
sentences.chinese: 一些狗狗的装饰陈设是由丹尼斯与弗朗西斯雕刻的。

sentences.english: The spright and diaphanous display produces a really snug and splendent atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 明快而精致的陈设创造了一个真正舒适与豪华的气氛。

sentences.english: For such matters as ritual vessels, there are the functionaries.
sentences.chinese: 陈设礼器之类的事，自有有关人员照管。

sentences.english: I live in a furnished flat in Grafton Street.
sentences.chinese: 我住在格拉芙顿街一套有家具陈设的住房里。

sentences.english: The room was furnished with carpets and chairs.
sentences.chinese: 房间里陈设有地毯和椅子。

sentences.english: Longquan celadon Product sub-daily-use porcelain and ceramic art display two broad categories.
sentences.chinese: 龙泉青瓷产品分日用瓷和陈设艺术瓷两大类。

sentences.english: Artificial bonsai was used for decoration and had the meaning of auspiciousness.
sentences.chinese: 像生盆景是清代宫廷中的陈设用品，多寓意吉祥。

sentences.english: Solomon also made all the furnishings that were in the Lord 's temple: the golden altar; the golden table on which was the bread of the Presence;
sentences.chinese: 所罗门又造耶和华殿里的金坛和陈设饼的金桌子。

sentences.english: The design of design flexibility in the use of soft furnishings and appropriate decorative lighting layout.
sentences.chinese: 本设计灵活运用陈设设计中软装饰以及适当灯光布局。

sentences.english: It all started with a window display at the company’s Paris store.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都始于公司巴黎店的一次橱窗陈设。

definition: to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
interesting and appealing (of old locations, objects etc)
lit. clear window and clean table (idiom)/fig. bright and clean
